law.catch_line: Approval of Cabinet for Health and Family Services required.
law.text: No application for a going-out-of-business sale shall be accepted by the county clerk if the sale involves foods or drugs damaged by fire or other casualty unless the approval of the Cabinet for Health and Family Services has first been obtained.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 617, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 572, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 384, sec. 495, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107 (1). -- Amended 1968 Ky. Acts ch. 152, sec. 153. -- Created 1966 Ky. Acts ch. 60, sec. 18.
